wikitext.*:
[[File:Unknown Dutchman 3 April 1958.jpg|thumb]] [[File:Unknown Dutchman 3 April 1958 (2).jpg|thumb]] [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to an unknown Dutchman''', postmarked [[3 April]] [[1958]].{{webcite|author=[[Pieter Collier]]|articleurl=http://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10152326056523792|articlename=(Timeline photo)|dated=20 March 2014|website=[http://www.facebook.com/ Facebook]|accessed=24 March 2014}} *'''Subject:''' A letter of reply to a Dutchman who had invited Tolkien for a cup of tea. *'''Description:''' Autograph letter, 1 page. Signed as [[Gandalf]] above a [[tengwar|tengwa]] ''[[ungwë]]''. At the bottom Tolkien wrote "2 [[Astron]]" (see [[Shire Calendar]]). *'''Publication:''' Not published. ==Transcription== {{blockquote|Keep the kettle handy! Look out for me especially at unlikely times. But I have unfortunately had to return over the Water on business.

Gandalf

2 [[Astron]]}} {{references}} [[Category:Letters|?]]
